item.title: Guitar Fretboard C Major Scale and Chord 12 Frets
item.description: This design shows 12 frets of a guitar fretboard and the positions of the notes of the C major scale C, D, E, F, G, A, B. item.title: Life Without Guitar Would B Flat (Bb) - Music Pun White Design
item.description: No guitarist who loves music wants to be in a world without guitars. Show your love for this awesome musical instrument. A funny design showing the text “Life Without Guitar Would” and a B-flat (Bb) guitar chord diagram. • Also buy this artwork on apparel, phone cases, home decor, and more.
